profile: For over 40 years, we have helped Ontario homeowners and builders build safer, more energy-efficient and sustainable communities. With a broad range of products and services, we are your insulation experts for existing home renovation upgrades and new residential home construction—satisfaction guaranteed. Proudly serving all of Southern Ontario, we are Ontario's largest insulation company and are Energy Star and Foam Masters™ certified. Get in touch for a Free In-Home Assessment—contact us today to learn more.
products:

✓ Cellulose (Blown and dense-pack)

✓ Mineral Wool (Batts)
✓ Hemp (Batts)
services:

profile:
Honesty, integrity, and Quality Workmanship

Reno~Ventions is a fully licensed and insured residential and commercial general contracting company. We have been exceeding customer expectations with every job completed for over twenty years. Our quality workmanship has earned us a reputation as one of the Regions premiere contractors for both commercial and residential projects. We specialize in complete home improvements, renovations, and remodeling. We do possess the knowledge, confidence, and experience to complete every project with 100% satisfaction to our valued clients.

Our projects have a 98% on-time completion record!

Reno ~ Ventions commitments:

5 year written warranty on our labor
On schedule completion dates
Cost-effective process from beginning to end
Final product exceeds expectations
Honesty, integrity, and great value
 Your satisfaction is our #1 priority!

profile:
While located in Mississauga, Ontario Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. offers our renovation services all over the GTA even covering the Niagara region. We are a family run business, strongly committed to providing a high quality of craftsmanship and customer service to each and every customer, no matter the size of the job. Over eighty percent of our business is from repeat and referral customers. This success stems, in part, from the reputation GHSL Inc. has built over the past 3 years in business.
 
While other companies may send their representatives to your home, the owners of Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. personally estimates each job and works side-by-side with you on every aspect of your project from start to finish. We are a start to finish company we will get your work done in a timely manner and minimize any down time that may occur during your project.
 
Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. licensed and for your protection we carry both liability and WSIB for all of our workers and employees. Our Company stand behind all work performed and backs all projects with a full 1 year warranty.
 
GHSL Inc. offers comprehensive remodeling services and is dedicated to ensuring complete satisfaction on each and every job. Whether you want to remodel the kitchen or redo the bathroom, our team of professional craftsmen can transform your wish list into the reality of a beautifully remodeled home.
